Name: Overconfident Sword-Swinger
Description: An arrogant fool who thinks they're invincible.

Name: Necrotic Understudy
Description: A skeleton who should've paid more attention in class.

Name: Crazed Knife Juggler
Description: Someone who likes knives way too much.

Name: Angry Campfire
Description: An elemental who feels insulted when used to make smores.

Name: Commander Funbane
Description: He who breaks those who aren't worthy of Villainhood.
